name: Aftershock
description: Spell. Nearby foes are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage. Knocked down foes are struck for 10...56...68 additional earth damage.

name: Air Attunement
description: Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill whenever you use Air Magic.

name: Armor of Earth
description: Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain 24...53...60 armor, but move 50...21...14% slower.

name: Aura of Restoration
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...360...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

name: Blinding Flash
description: Spell. Target foe is Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

name: Blurred Vision
description: Hex Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes are hexed with Blurred Vision. While hexed, those foes have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.

name: Conjure Flame
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a fire weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 fire damage.

name: Conjure Frost
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a cold weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 cold damage.

name: Conjure Lightning
description: Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a lightning weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 lightning damage.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Hex Spell. You cause a Deep Freeze at target foe's location. All foes in this area are struck for 10...70...85 cold damage, and for 10 seconds, they move 66% slower.

name: Earth Attunement
description: Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.

name: Elemental Attunement
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 25...53...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air, Fire, Water, and Earth and gain +1...2...2 to these attributes. You gain 50% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use magic associated with any of these elements.

name: Enervating Charge
description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...45...50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

name: Fire Attunement
description: Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Fire. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Fire Magic.

name: Fire Storm
description: Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

name: Fireball
description: Spell. Send out a ball of fire that strikes target foe and all adjacent foes for 7...91...112 fire damage.

name: Flare
description: Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

name: Gale
description: Spell. Knock down target foe for 2 seconds. (50% failure chance with Air Magic 4 or less.)

name: Glyph of Elemental Power
description: Glyph. For 25 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 2 for your next 10 spells.

name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
description: Glyph. For the next 15 seconds, your next 2 spells cost 10...16...18 less Energy to cast.

name: Ice Spear
description: Enchantment Spell. Send out an Ice Spear, striking target foe for 10...50...60 cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, you gain +1...3...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.

name: Ice Spikes
description: Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 20...68...80 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds.

name: Immolate
description: Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...64...75 fire damage and is set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

name: Inferno
description: Spell.  All adjacent foes are struck for 30...114...135 fire damage.

name: Lightning Orb
description: Spell. Send out a Lightning Orb that strikes target foe for 10...82...100 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Hex Spell. Strike target foe for 5...41...50 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Lightning Strike for 3 seconds. When this hex ends, that foe is struck again for 5...41...50 lightning damage.

name: Lightning Surge
description: Elite Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe is knocked down and struck for 14...83...100 lightning damage, and has Cracked Armor for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

name: Lightning Touch
description: Skill. Target touched foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...50...60 lightning damage, are Blinded for 1...3...4 second[s], and have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s]. This skill has 25% armor penetration.

name: Maelstrom
description: Spell. Create a Maelstrom at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that area are struck for 10...22...25 cold damage each second. Maelstrom interrupts spell-casting when it hits.

name: Meteor
description: Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

name: Mind Burn
description: Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 15...51...60 fire damage.  If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional 15...51...60 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...8...10 second[s].

name: Mind Freeze
description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...50...60 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...4...5 second[s].

name: Mind Freeze (PvP)
description: Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...34...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...34...40 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...4...5 seconds.

name: Obsidian Flame
description: Spell. Deal 22...94...112 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

name: Obsidian Flame (PvP)
description: Spell. Deal 22...78...92 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

name: Obsidian Flesh
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

name: Over the Limit
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast  15...19...20% faster, and recharge 15...43...50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast. PvE Skill

name: Rust
description: Hex Spell. Deals 10...58...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to activate signets. If you are Overcast, foes struck with Rust have their signets interrupted and disabled for 1...8...10 second[s].

name: Stone Daggers
description: Spell. Send out two Stone Daggers. Each Stone Dagger strikes target foe for 8...28...33 earth damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, each projectile inflicts Bleeding for 1...4...5 second[s].

name: Stoning
description: Spell. Send out a large stone, striking target foe for 45...93...105 earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down.

name: Ward Against Foes
description: Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Foes at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit foes in this area move 50% slower.

name: Ward Against Melee
description: Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Melee at your current location. For 5...17...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a 50% chance to block melee attacks.

name: Water Attunement
description: Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.
